info.name: What! Are you Kidding me? 1234
info.description: Gravity, Electromagnetism, and chromodynamics combined into a single wave system. Change the scale of the simulation with k in the common tab. Create  subatomic particles with the mouse!

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy

#define A(U) texture(iChannel0, (U)/R)
#define B(U) texture(iChannel1, (U)/R)
#define C(U) texture(iChannel2, (U)/R)
#define D(U) texture(iChannel3, (U)/R)


// Affects scale  :
#define k .5
renderpass.name: Common
Buffer A
Buffer B
Buffer C
Buffer D
